item.title: Crypto Until Infinity #39: Mainstream Adoption is Picking Up
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: In episode 39 of the Bitcoin Podcast Network’s music broadcast, Crypto Until Infinity, host DJsNeverEndingStory speaks on PewDiePie bringing his 90+ million YouTube subscribers to a blockchain video platform, Coinbase teaming up with Visa for a crypto debit card, exchanges delisting Bitcoin SV, and a new Canadian stablecoin on the way. Get your Until Infinity […]

item.title: Crypto Until Infinity #38: Crypto is Maturing
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: In episode 38 of the Bitcoin Podcast Network’s music broadcast, Crypto Until Infinity, host DJsNeverEndingStory speaks on the maturing cryptocurrency markets. Cumberland, the trading firm that gives financial institutions and high net worth individuals access to cryptoassets, tweets why the sudden surge in Bitcoin price occurred. Australia’s school systems provide cryptocurrency programs. Grayscale investments holds […]

item.title: Crypto Until Infinity #37: More Hacks and Criminals
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: In episode 37 of the Bitcoin Podcast Network’s music broadcast, Crypto Until Infinity, host DJsNeverEndingStory speaks on the latest Bithumb exchange hack, Mt. Gox reentering crypto, LVHM interest in blockchain, the ex-Enron CEO interest in blockchain, crypto users “body-hacking”, and a new blockchain music platform in the news. Music from this episode starts with a […]

item.title: Crypto Until Infinity #36: The Latest Scams In Crypto
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: In episode 36 of the Bitcoin Podcast Network’s music broadcast, Crypto Until Infinity, host DJsNeverEndingStory returns with news about the latest scams in cryptocurrency. Topics include a new study reported by The Wall Street Journal that most bitcoin trading is fake, the QuadrigaCX exchange losing around $150,000,000 of clientele money, U.S. authorities arresting OneCoin founders, […]

item.title: Crypto Until Infinity #35: Your Crypto Resources
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: In episode 35 of the Bitcoin Podcast Network’s music broadcast, Crypto Until Infinity, host DJsNeverEndingStory celebrates 1 year of being on The Bitcoin Podcast Network and provides some resources for understanding the crypto ecosystem. Music in this episode comes from the Until Infinity EP http://smarturl.it/UntilInfinityEP and a mix of chill r&b and hip-hop. CoinMarketCal https://coinmarketcal.com/en/ […]

item.title: Crypto Until Infinity #33: You’re Gonna Lose Everything
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: In episode 33 of the Bitcoin Podcast Network’s music broadcast, Crypto Until Infinity, host DJsNeverEndingStory talks about the massive layoffs in cryptocurrency organizations and coins that have stopped development. Coinbase adds new ways to cash out into fiat and more on this episode. Music in this episode is a mix of afrobeat, hip-hop, and r&b. […]

item.title: Crypto Until Infinity #32: What You Missed In Crypto
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: In episode 32 of the Bitcoin Podcast Network’s music broadcast, Crypto Until Infinity, host DJsNeverEndingStory provides a recap of stories in crypto since the last broadcast two weeks ago. Stories include new developments with blockchain music platforms Choon and Musicoin, a new PS4 blockchain game, crypto on Jeopardy, DJ Khaled and Floyd Mayweather Jr. fined […]

item.title: Crypto Until Infinity #30: Did Your Vote Count?
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: In episode 30 of the Bitcoin Podcast Network’s music broadcast, Crypto Until Infinity, host DJsNeverEndingStory talks about the recent U.S. midterm elections. Music in this episode is a mix of hip-hop and alternative r&b. item.title: Crypto Until Infinity #29: Short and Sweet
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: In episode 29 of the Bitcoin Podcast Network’s music broadcast, Crypto Until Infinity, host DJsNeverEndingStory announces a new type of stablecoin not pegged to the U.S. dollar, a crypto exchange acquisition, and more on this short episode featuring a mix of afrobeats and R&B music.
